author: ETA PRIME
description:
n this video, we’re pushing the limits of handheld gaming with something wild — battery-powered dual GPU gameplay!
We’re using the Lenovo Legion Go 2 powered by the Ryzen Z2 Extreme APU and pairing it with an external RTX A400/A500 Pocket AI GPU over Thunderbolt 4 to create a completely portable dual-GPU setup. Using Lossless Scaling for frame generation, we’re able to double — and sometimes triple — the frame rate in demanding games like God of War Ragnarok, The Witcher 3, Cyberpunk 2077, and Spider-Man 2.
The crazy part? Everything’s running on battery power — no wall power, no docked display — just pure portable performance.
We’ll go over setup, GPU allocation, frame generation tuning, and performance results across multiple titles.
If you’ve ever wondered what happens when you combine AI accelerators, handheld gaming PCs, and frame generation, this is the video to watch!

Buy The Legion Go 2 from Lenovo: https://howl.link/sqbolwnvo7pw9
Buy The Legion Go 2 from Best Buy: https://be
title: Battery Powered Dual GPU Gaming on a Handheld!? It Actually Works!
